member.name: Inventory
member.summary:
The Player.Inventory object contains the player inventory, including:
PaperDoll Equipped stuff
Backpack A bag that holds stuff.

member.name: Equipped
member.summary:
A list of what the character has equipped in the following slots:
Head Helmets, hats, etc.
Torso Armor, shirts, etc.
Leg Armor, pants, skirts, etc.
Foot Boots, shoes, etc.

member.name: Equipped.Head
member.summary:
Equipment on a character's head.
Example: "Helmet"

member.name: Equipped.Torso
member.summary:
Equipment on a character's torso.
Example: "Shirt"

member.name: Equipped.Leg
member.summary:
Equipment on a character's legs.
Example: "Pants"

member.name: Equipped.Foot
member.summary:
Equipment on a character's feet.
Example: "Boots"

member.name: Backpack
member.summary:
Contents of a character's backpack.
Example: "Water, Blanket, Red key"
